name: Your Heistness
description:
A band of thieves have disguised themselves as royal guards and stole the crown! The queen has decided to take matters into her own hands and will carry out a reverse heist to steal back the crown! These thieves might think the queen is old and frail but they are in for a world of hurt once she gets her crown back!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to move

Spacebar to jump.

Old Queen:

Z - Build platform

X - Crystal flash bang

Young Queen:

Z - Dive Kick (while jumping)

X - Ground Pound
